duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete daily filing of customer account information, including open files, letters, and mail sorting.
Process outgoing letters, pull files as needed, and prepare files for shipment to an off-site imaging and storage facility.
Complete transmittal logs, Fed-Ex processing, and check processing.
Assist departments with miscellaneous office tasks and adhere to legal and operational compliance.
Become a productive member of the team with an enthusiastic and positive attitude.
Long-term temporary assignment with no set time or guarantee of a full-time position.
Ideal for those seeking an entry-level position in the general field of customer service and/or automotive finance.

skills.skill: Training (web-based, book, and side by side)

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent, training (approximately one week)
